title: [Infirmary, Patient Room]
description: This spartan room is furnished only with a narrow bed, a small nightstand, and stiff-backed wooden chair.  The mattress has been flipped onto the floor.  Moonlight streams through a small, round window set high on the wall, casting the room in a blue glow.

This spartan room is furnished only with a narrow bed, a small nightstand, and stiff-backed wooden chair.  The mattress has been flipped onto the floor.  Sunlight streams through a small, round window set high on the wall, casting the room in a gold aura.
